name: AlbumCtrl
short_description:
Winamp plugin allowing the user to control albums playback using global hotkeys. The plugin uses the local media library in order to gather information about the user's media files. 

Developers will require the Winamp SDK as well as any recent version of visual studio in order to build the plugin.
summary: Winamp plugin to control albums playback using global hotkeys
